entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
